Chesterfield have signed goalkeeper Ryan Fulton on a season-long loan deal from Premier League side Liverpool.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The 20-year-old, who has yet to make a first team appearance for the Reds, played 13 times during a loan spell with Portsmouth in 2015-16.
Fulton could start the season as Spireites number one, with Tommy Lee due to undergo shoulder surgery.
The Scotland youth international has travelled to Hungary to join up with the club's pre-season training camp.
